remarks: Sublattice mapping for a dual-modular pair.  Part of Theorem 1.3 of [MaedaMaeda] p. 2.  (Contributed by NM, 26-Apr-2006.) (New usage is discouraged.)
statement: dmdsl3 $p |- ( ( ( A e. CH /\ B e. CH /\ C e. CH ) /\ ( B MH* A /\ A C_ C /\ C C_ ( A vH B ) ) ) -> ( ( C i^i B ) vH A ) = C ) $.
